songs.title: Rock With You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Girl, close your eyes
Let that rhythm get into you
Don't try to fight it
There ain't nothin' that you can do
Relax your mind
Lay back and groove with mine

[Pre-Chorus]
You gotta feel that heat
And we can ride the boogie
Share that beat of love

[Chorus]
I wanna rock with you (all night)
Dance you into day (sunlight)
I wanna rock with you (all night)
We're gonna rock the night away

[Verse 2]
Out on the floor
There ain't nobody there but us
Girl, when you dance
There's a magic that must be lo-ove
Just take it slow
'Cause we got so far to go

[Pre-Chorus]
And when you feel that heat
Then we're gonna ride the boogie
Share that beat of love

[Chorus]
I wanna rock with you (all night)
Dance you into day (sunlight)
I wanna rock with you (all night)
We're gonna rock the night away

[Bridge]
And when the groove is dead and gone, yeah
You know that love survives
So we can rock forever on...

I wanna rock with you
I wanna groove with you

I wanna rock with you
I wanna groove with you

[Outro]
I wanna rock (all night)
With you, girl (sunlight)
Rock with you, rock with you (all night)
Dance the night away

I wanna rock with you , yeah, wo-oah (all night)
Rock you into day (sunlight)
I wanna rock with you (all night)
Rock the night away

Feel the heat, feel the beat, whoo! (all night)
Rock you into day (sunlight)
I wanna rock (all night)
Rock the night away
